channel.title: Highscores help (soz if wrong section)
channel.description:
ok i got my own highscores for my server and i would like it to be some what like the rs highscores but every time i try to do it i get the background and a plain old tan middle but no lines to separate the names, the ridged sides, etc. please help!
this is what i got so far- http://coalscapex.forumotion.com/Highscores-h1.htm

item.title: Highscores help (soz if wrong section)
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:10, topic:314137”][quote author=inertia link=topic=410614.msg3029691#msg3029691 date=1258279312]
Ughh I knew I shouldn’t have made that post… For him, I think it would be a much better idea to just copy the code for their table and make any small modifications himself. I don’t think they’d make a lawsuit out of someone copying their styling for a table when there’s a private server running on the site.
[/quote]

When they are at the job, why wouldn’t they add that to the file? With Christmas coming up, they can use some money to pay presents for the employers’ children.[/quote]??

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores help (soz if wrong section)
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

inertia:

Are you writing your own HTML or copying Runescapes? Because if you want it to have the exact same layout as Runescape there’s nothing wrong with using their code as long as you stored images and css stuff on your server. (Only the table, you wont get away with stealing the whole page :P)

There is actually a lot wrong with “using their code”.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores help (soz if wrong section)
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

Also, you might get away with posting this question in the web development section. I say this because most moparscapers are idiots and you most likely won’t find a decent solution.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores help (soz if wrong section)
item.dc:creator: @coalman58 coalman58
item.description:
@coalman58 wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:4, topic:314137”][quote author=coalman58 link=topic=410614.msg3029012#msg3029012 date=1258230632]

This is nothing to do with RS2 client hacking.

Please post further questions over at moparscape.
[/quote]i did but lesterknome said to come over here so idk where to go then

He told you that, because normally mitbers will flame you.[/quote]ahhh kk idk how i would be so stupid to fall for that lol o well just lock this or remove it and ill try again on moparscape

Read full topic
